title: TL;DR of today's SCOTUS ruling
body:
1. The last 30% of states have to follow basic human rights outlined in the constitution
2. Gay people are happy to be able to marry for real and receive the legal benefits with it
3. A swarm of memelords come onto GD to make dank slippery slope threads/religion bait and whinge about the happiness of others
4. http://i.imgur.com/tTtVZaf.gif[/img]
